靠.definition: to lean against or on; to stand by the side of; to come near to; to depend on; to trust; to fuck (vulgar); traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

靠北.definition: (Tw) (slang) to rattle on; to carp; stop whining!; shut the hell up!; fuck!; damn! (from Taiwanese 哭爸, Tai-lo pr. [khàu-pē], "to cry over one's dad's death")

靠山.definition: patron; backer; close to a mountain

靠山吃山，靠水吃水.pinyin: kào shān chī shān ， kào shuǐ chī shuǐ
靠山吃山，靠水吃水.definition: lit. the mountain dweller lives off the mountain, the shore dweller lives off the sea (idiom); fig. to make the best use of local resources; to exploit one's position to advance oneself; to find one's niche; to live off the land

靠岸.definition: (of a boat) to reach the shore; to pull toward shore; close to shore; landfall

靠窗.definition: by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)

靠腰.definition: (lit.) to cry from hunger (from Taiwanese 哭枵, Tai-lo pr. [khàu-iau]); (Tw) (slang) to whine; shut the hell up!; fuck!; damn!

靠走廊.definition: next to the aisle; aisle (seat on aircraft)

靠走道.definition: on the aisle (referring to seats on a plane etc)

靠近.definition: to be close to; to approach; to draw near

靠邊.definition: to keep to the side; to pull over; move aside!
